DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effectiveness of Glucobay when combined with a basal insulin under daily-life treatment conditions in a large sample of Korean patients.
DOC.brief_title: GlucoFriend-evaluation the Effectiveness of Glucobay When Combined With a Basal Insulin
DOC.criteria: Signed written informed consent Age ≥ 18 years Diagnosed of type 2 diabetes for at least 6 months prior to enrollment Patients treated with stable dose of a basal insulin (insulin glargine or insulin detemir) at least 2 months HbA1C≥7.5 and ≤10.0% Exclusion criteria must be read in conjunction with the local product information
